metadata.synopsis: At the wine festival, if players kill Cora Highberry, Dolor's Target, he will say a few words and later run away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill Cora (S_LOW_CoraHighberry_8a520cf7-c5da-419f-bdd4-792b27c5c679) when the wine festival is happening (LOW_SerialKiller_State_WineFestival_a83198eb-b080-4001-bd00-d8368f1334a5)

0.speaker: Meztli
0.text: Curious. Appears I have competition. I will see you again.
